movies.title: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper
movies.plot: Freed of her responsibilities with the 501 Organization, Motoko Kusanagi must now learn how to take orders from Aramaki. Someone hacks the Logicomas, and Batou enlists the help of former army intelligence officer Ishikawa and former air artillery expert Borma. Kusanagi also seeks to enlist ace sniper Saito and undercover cop Paz into the new Public Security Section 9.
movies.simplePlot: Witness the formation of the legendary Public Security Section 9. When a clandestine organization hacks every car in the city, Kusanagi recruits a lethal team of cyber operatives to clamp down on the chaos and make the city safe again.

biography.bio: Maaya Sakamoto was born on March 31, 1980 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Ghost in the Shell (1995) and Ouran High School Host Club (2006). She has been married to Ken'ichi Suzumura since August 8, 2011.
biography.name: Maaya Sakamoto

biography.bio: Ikkyu Juku is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013), Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie (2015) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013).
biography.name: Ikkyu Juku

biography.bio: Ken'ichirô Matsuda was born on January 22, 1978 in Saitama Prefecture, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie (2015), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013).
biography.name: Ken'ichirô Matsuda

biography.bio: Tomoyuki Dan was born on August 6, 1963 in Osaka, Japan. He was an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013) and Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie (2012). He was married to Giryoko and Ryôko Gi. He died on October 10, 2013 in Japan.
biography.name: Tomoyuki Dan

biography.bio: Takurou Nakakuni is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 3 - Ghost Tears (2014) and Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie (2015).
biography.name: Takurou Nakakuni

biography.bio: Yôji Ueda was born on August 7, 1971 in Kobe, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013) and One Punch Man (2015).
biography.name: Yôji Ueda

biography.bio: Kazuya Nakai was born on November 25, 1967 in Kobe, Japan. He is an actor, known for Gintama (2006), Samurai Champloo (2004) and One Piece Film Z (2012).
biography.name: Kazuya Nakai

biography.bio: Miyuki Sawashiro was born on June 2, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Hunter x Hunter (2011), Tegamibachi (2009) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007).
biography.name: Miyuki Sawashiro

biography.bio: Ikuya Sawaki was born on August 25, 1951 in Chiba, Japan. He is known for his work on Transformers: The Headmasters (1987), Umezu Kazuo no Noroi (1990) and Fist of the North Star (1986).
biography.name: Ikuya Sawaki

biography.bio: Born in Tokyo on July 27th 1972, Takako Fuji started her career when she joined En Theatrical Campany when she was studying acting at Aoyama Gakuin University. She was mainly playing on the stage or voice-over, and had the screen debut in 2003 as Kayako Saeki in "Ju-On" directed by Takashi Shimizu. Her specialty is dancing modern ballet, and speaking English.
biography.name: Takako Fuji

biography.bio: Tetsuo Gotô is an actor, known for Eureka Seven: Ao (2012), Karas: The Prophecy (2005) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013).
biography.name: Tetsuo Gotô

biography.bio: Madoka Shiga is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013), Drakengard 3 (2013) and Fire Emblem: Fates (2015).
biography.name: Madoka Shiga

biography.bio: Haruo Satô is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013), The Legend of Zelda: Tri Force Heroes (2015) and Loups=Garous (2010).
biography.name: Haruo Satô

actors.character: Man from Ministry of Internal Affairs

biography.bio: Ryûichi Kijima is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Boruto: Naruto the Movie (2015) and Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part III: Rebellion (2013).
biography.name: Ryûichi Kijima

biography.bio: Yuka Keicho is an actress, known for Patéma et le monde inversé (2013), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 3 - Ghost Tears (2014).
biography.name: Yuka Keicho
